name: aspens-playground
description: Multiplayer zombie shooter in a haunted arcade

scripts.build: npm run build:js && echo Build complete!
scripts.build:js: terser game.js -o game.min.js -c -m && terser service-worker.js -o service-worker.min.js -c -m
scripts.build:analyze: echo game.js: && wc -c game.js && echo game.min.js: && wc -c game.min.js 2>/dev/null || echo (run npm run build first)
